code: import{executeErrorHandler,resetErrorHandler}from"./actions";import{logout}from"../auth/operations";var handleHTTPError=function handleHTTPError(error){return function(dispatch){if(error.status!==401){dispatch(executeErrorHandler(error));}else{dispatch(logout());}return Promise.resolve(error);};};var resetHTTPError=function resetHTTPError(){return function(dispatch){return dispatch(resetErrorHandler());};};export{handleHTTPError,resetHTTPError};
